title: OMG LOCK IN YOUR CHAMP SELECTS!!!! :@:@:@:@:@:@:@:@:@:@:@
body: I HAVE BEEN IN QUEUE FOR AN HOUR! AND THE ONE GAME THAT ACTUALLY WENT THROUGH CRASHED AT LOAD IN AND SAID TO RE-QUEUE!

replies.body: 80 MINUTES AND WE'RE LOADING IN, SUPPORT GETS AN DIRECTX ERROR! AWWW YEAH
whinge much?  I love the new champ select
No guys there was extensive testing in other regions. This system is failsafe and player satisfaction has risen 1000%. Also all trolls have been eliminated.
To be honest I think the system is great, when the system works it works really well. The only downfall is the need to lock in champs as sooooooo many queues have been dodged because of it

Use new system first time & mess it up, 5 min que dodge timer.
Ok i can live with this.
Go a second time, get the whole thing correct. Talking to team about start of game stuff we'll run, forget to click 'lockin' after already doing it 3 times.

30 min que dodge timer.
What a crock of shit.
